name: Tuta
description: An end-to-end encrypted email software and freemium hosted secure email service based in Germany, with a focus on security and privacy.
longDescription:
Tuta is a secure email service developed by a German company that focuses on providing end-to-end encrypted communication. The name 'Tuta' is derived from Latin and means 'secure message'. Created in 2011, Tuta has grown to become one of Europe's leading privacy-focused email providers.

Unlike conventional email services, Tuta encrypts all data on the user's device, ensuring that not even the company itself can access the content of emails. This approach provides a high level of privacy and security for users concerned about data protection.

As a German company, Tuta operates under the strict European data protection regulations, including GDPR. The service is available as both a free and premium offering, with the latter providing additional features and storage capacity. Tuta's commitment to privacy, security, and open-source development has made it popular among privacy-conscious individuals, journalists, and organizations worldwide.
